website_summaries.verdict: A soft, easy to use spoon that is a top choice for babies on pureed foods
pros: Users love the fun colors, special design that lifts when set down, and soft design
We also love that these spoons are well-made and tend not to stain
cons: A few felt they were too flat and long
occasional issues with the spoons being placed in a bottle sanitizer or dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I really like these baby spoons. Aesthetically, I love the rainbow colors. They are affordable compared to other popular spoons such as the OXO (pictured). They are lightweight and easy for baby to manipulate. But best of all, they have the rest so when you put it down, you don't get baby food on your table or high chair tray. I love these so much that I bought a second set!
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: We love this spoon! So easy for baby to self feed. Great for yogurts too!
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons. They are easy to clean, easy to feed baby & easy for baby to hold. It's very well designed in my opinion. We have many different baby spoons but this one is my favorite. Because the front of the spoon is rectangular and flat, serving semiliquid items like yogurt is much easier for baby. Also, the entire spoon from handle to mouth lies on a straight plane (as compared to spoons that are angled from handle to mouth) it's very easy for baby to self feed. The downside of this spoon is that it's harder for liquid items like soup. But we've a separate spoon for that. Anyway, overall we love this spoon!
customer_reviews.author: C Z

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it with my baby for about 4 months. He started solid food at 4 months and I was looking for a spoon soft and comfortable for him as well. He likes to hold it and pretending to eat. Depending on the type of food you make for you baby, specially if is carrots, my blue spoon turned a little bit into orange color and for me it always seems that is not clean enough. That is my only complaint. Overall, it’s good!
customer_reviews.author: MayaStein

customer_reviews.title: Great first set for baby/toddler
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for us, I have a 6 month old and was unsure what to buy and what our baby would like. These were recommended by my cousin who used them with her son and for the price I thought I would give them a try! They worked out great and I just reordered another set. They worked better for teaching our little one to eat and the soft plastic was soft in his month because the entire thing is soft plastic and no metal. They wash great and are easy for our son to pick up and learn to use. Colors are also fun and bright!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Berger

customer_reviews.title: poor design, food falls off.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered these spoons for her four month old granddaughter thinking they would be a soft easy spoon to use. My granddaughter is tiny for her age with a small mouth these spoon are wide and were a little big for her mouth. The description states that they make wiping the food that falls out of her mouth easy which is try, the problem is that these spoons are almost flat a spatula and the food just falls right off the spoon smiling more food then what goes into her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: c.iriguchi

customer_reviews.title: To love and not to love
customer_reviews.text: First I will say I LOVE these spoons. They are smooth on my babies soft gums and he has no issues eating his food off of them. They SAY top rack dishwasher safe, but when I first got them I washed them in a top rack basket and 3 of them came out melted! So it was a waste of almost half of them from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think about how heavy the handle was before purchasing and how that would make it so I couldn't rest the spoon in the b
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are so long that they fall out of all of our baby bowls. I didn't think about how heavy the handle was before purchasing and how that would make it so I couldn't rest the spoon in the bowl like one does. My baby is already able to get an adequate amount of baby food on the floor without the extra help.
customer_reviews.author: She's Crafty

customer_reviews.title: Warped after sanitizing
customer_reviews.text: Sooo, I sanitized these and they warped on me. I always boil everything for 5 minutes (recommended sanitizing time) and this has never happened.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylen Hill

customer_reviews.title: Classic baby spoons
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about these are first since the tips are plastic, not soft rubber. But I've found that the material actually makes feeding easier. The firmer tip is way easier to scoop with, and the baby seems to have no problem getting the food off the spoon. The handle is really long, so there's enough space for mom's hands and baby's hands to both hold the spoon together. This is nice when you're trying to stop the baby from throwing food everywhere. I'll definitely be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Spoons Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these spoons for our 7 month old daughter when she started eating solids. Love these! They are comfortable to hold and machine washable. When the spoon is set on a hard surface, such as a table or highchair tray, the spoon tilts upward, so that it doesn't touch the surface. This is nice for cleanliness purposes. Our daughter doesn't seem to have any trouble holding these spoons. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not loving these
customer_reviews.text: I love my munchkin ones that turn white when hot so I figured I’d love these...not so much. The little knob under it to keep the spoon from touching table is all fine and dandy if the spoon was weighed in a way to keep it facing up. I felt it tipped easy and the “leg” actually got in the way when digging for food from baby jar. I just ordered more of the other ones instead. Liked the quantity and colors but was frustrated by the rest
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lockley

customer_reviews.title: Nice and long, not too flexible.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars bc I thought they would be softer on the tips, like silicone rubber. They’re more of a soft plastic. You can see in the photo how it flexes, so that’s good. I just thought it would be more flexible. Other pros are that it can lay flat without the end of the spoon touching the table. But there’s usually food all over the spoon so that doesn’t really matter. I do love how long these are though, to reach across the high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Parris

customer_reviews.title: Good size and very soft
customer_reviews.text: This spoon actually is perfect size to feed the baby, it is very soft and easy to hold , but the problems when you clean or boiling this spoons, sometimes spoons get bent or dirty or sticky , so you have to change for a new one at lease 1-2 month for healthy !
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great infant spoon
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter was an infant we used these spoons all the time and they worked well. Now that she is a toddler she does not like the shape and won't use them anymore. While we were using them they seemed durable and easy to clean. I did manage to partially melt one by putting it on the bottom rack in the dishwasher but when they were on the top rack of the dishwasher they were fine. I will use them again for my next little one on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shape for babies learning to eat
customer_reviews.text: I thought my son just wasn’t into food, just wanted to nurse. Never in a million years would I have thought to try a different spoon. We were running low on kid spoons from losing them or the dog chewing them up so I bought these. This company really knows babies. The flatness of the spoon portion made it easier for my son to eat food. They also double as a teether! I freakin love these!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Dunker

customer_reviews.title: horrible design, great to hold in hands but keeps falling out of the bowl
customer_reviews.text: these have a great size for the baby mouth and the handle is a great size for the mama's hands. however, the handle is heavier than the spoon tip which causes the spoon to constantly fall out of all smaller bowls (basically all kids bowls) and make a big mess. It is funny they would make the little pedestal on the bottom so you can put it on the table without it touching the surface (which I find useless), all I want is a spoon that stays in the bowl when I am not holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and shape, kinda messy
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. They are light and easy to hold so baby can bang them around and have fun. They are also thick enough that I don’t worry about baby shoving it down his throat (sounds horrible but it happens!) Tey are pretty messy though. The whole “put it on the counter” part I don’t really get.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Krofchik

customer_reviews.title: The Best Baby Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Of all the baby spoons we’ve tried, this is by far our most Favorite. So much, that we’ve ordered extra sets for gifts. The baby preferred this spoon over the others as well. It’s durable and holds up to baby teeth clamping down on the spoon part. It’s easy for him to grab and start to learn how to self feed. Of the different brands we’ve tried, we all go back to this spoon.
customer_reviews.author: paintmehazel

customer_reviews.title: The best baby spoons!
customer_reviews.text: The best baby spoons! We have tried several Different spoons to feed our baby and these are by far the best! Other spoons are good but the way they are shaped the food stays on the spoon and it’s harder to get in our baby’s mouth. I love how these are flatter, they go smoothly into his mouth. I highly recommend these. Will only use these now.
customer_reviews.author: Steph01

customer_reviews.title: Best spoons ever
customer_reviews.text: The flat surface of these work great for infants because you can get more food in their mouth than the other fully silicone spoons that are about half the surface size of these. I use these if they’re clean over my other ones. Since my son doesn’t always open his mouth wide enough these still deliver the food without the mess
customer_reviews.author: Original Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Not nice to hold and cumbersome. Not normal spoons with spoon functionality
customer_reviews.text: Spoons are spoons right? Wrong. These spoons have the weirdest weight distribution which I understand was intended to keep the spoon up. Let's be real, how long will a baby allow you to keep a spoon in her vicinity without grabbing it with her grabby little hands? Maybe half a second. Just make spoons, people. Normal spoons.
customer_reviews.author: avr1891

customer_reviews.title: Son’s favorite spoons
customer_reviews.text: It’s weird that a baby can have a spoon preference, but he does. He LOVES these spoons (and hates every other). He likes to play with one while I am preparing/cleaning up his food. Super easy to clean, they don’t get hot, and I’m not afraid to give one to baby to entertain himself. My older daughter liked these too. Mama of 2 approved!
customer_reviews.author: JEvans2016

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons for starting solids
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great. They come in 2 packs of 3 in the colors shown. They are relatively flat and my son is able to get the food off of it. The "lift" is helpful but I don't find myself leaving the spoon on the tray because my son will grab it and start playing with it. May be better for when he is older (only 6 months old right now). However I can see how it would be very useful. Easy to clean. He loves to chew on them when his food is gone. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Melted in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Several of these have melted in the dishwasher and become misshapen. It happened to the handle end, not the spoon end, or else I would discontinue use. They also discolor after eating lots of orange baby foods, but most spoons do. I never had a spoon melt in the dishwasher before though.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great for baby. Flexible plastic makes it easy for baby to learn how to use the spoon. The handle is long which makes feeding baby easier! Also, the color turns white If the food is too hot- this functions better than other “white hot” products I’ve purchased in the past. I wish I had bought these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Long handle tips out
customer_reviews.text: So the spoon on this is super shallow, so if you tilt it in the least bit, baby food slides right off. Next it's supposed to rest flat on a table, nope not really. The handle is so long it kind of does but just tips over. Lastly because the handle is so long if you put it spoon side down into a cup or bowl it flips out.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen_table_manicure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 7 mo. grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that the spoons my daughter had were kind of over sized and sloppy and food feeding was not that easy. The Munchkin were just perfect and had the perfect balance in size and spoon flexibility. I like the part where the spoon can rest on a table with food and does not stain the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mini hands friendly
customer_reviews.text: Needed a smaller head with a long body for special needs baby and this was perfect for him! The spoons we kept finding had very wide heads and he could not fit them in his tiny mouth ( 18 months). We are teaching him to hold the spoon and get accustomed to the idea of eating, which he never has and the design of this spoon is perfect for this! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pretty PainterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: we have many different kinds of baby spoons gifted from others -- these are my favorite at least for my 5 month old so far because the base is flat. it is almost like a mini spatula. the ones with a deeper dip in the middle the food just stays there because baby just scrapes off whatever is flat.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are long, however, they seem “rough” to touch. The texture seems sharp versus smooth. We have had a couple that have been damaged in the dishwasher. The “rest” that supposedly helps the spoon from touching the table is useless. The spoon tips over unless you are very intentional when putting it down—-let’s be real, dealing with an infant while feeding.
customer_reviews.author: sniper301

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons. Super easy to clean and a nice small size for a baby mouth. One thing is because of the long handle it isn’t very easy for the baby (6 months) to pick up food and direct into his own mouth, but I like the long handle of you are spoon feeding baby.
customer_reviews.author: quillah

customer_reviews.title: Flexible to fit
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these spoons I figured I was just getting cheap hard plastic spoons to just get by until I find more. When they arrived I was more than happy with them! They are sturdy but have a flexibility to them that helps my baby get ahold of the food better in his mouth. The shape and size also was a perfect fit too (I had tried others and they were either too big or too curved of a spoon). These spoons also are very very easy to clean with just water and mild soap. I will continue to buy these for my little one :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good size & easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great for my infant who just started solid foods. The size of the actual bowl/spoon part is perfect for his tiny mouth. I took off 1 star, though, because the handles are a little too long. My son will grab it and shove it so far in his mouth that he gags. But then again, maybe he would find a way to do that with any infant spoon... They are definitely easy to clean, and the self-standing feature is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I love these because I can sanitize them. They are sturdy yet soft enough for an infant mouth. And they are a great price. I don’t think there is anything super special about baby spoons, babies eating are messy. So go with an easy spoon that just work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good spoon and has a tab on bottom of the handle which allows you to set the spoon down without the part that goes into your child’s touching the table! My only dislike is the length of the handle. While it makes it easier to reach your child’s mouth from a bowl or plate it also allows more room for the child to grab it
customer_reviews.author: Julie Frierson

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I’m glad they’re a little flexible so it’s easy to scrape around the bowl for that one last bite of baby food. They come with a small point on the underside of the spoon so it rests nicely and doesn’t touch the counter. Perfect amount come in the pack so it’s not too little or too much product. Overall great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: They are great for feeding baby but I will say they stain quite easily especially with foods like carrots and sweet potatoes. Other than that they are great tossing in the diaper bag! I love the bright colors and how the spoon is small enough to fit easily into baby’s mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and rest keeps spoon off table
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are so great! They are flat enough so they don’t hold overly large amounts of food for my baby’s mouth. The spoon rest on the bottom is the best part though to keep the spoon off the table surface. Less to be concerned about germs and less baby food to clean off the table is a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: B. Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome spoons!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome spoons! I was using the oxo baby spoon which was ok for the beginning but needed something better. These spoons were recommended by a mom friend and I'm so glad I got them. The spoons are wider yet thinner and easier to feed baby. I rarely even need a bib since it so much easier to feed! I like the thin longer design and very easy to rinse clean. Great for home and on the go and they dont break the bank. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: LeelooTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Hard tips that gag baby
customer_reviews.text: Because of the "lift" feature, the weight is out of balance and they do not sit in small baby sized bowls, they tip out. Also, they are hard and would gag my baby, I bought some silicone ones instead and they did not gag baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great baby spoons
customer_reviews.text: Many other spoons we tried were too hard for my daughter to get the food off of. These are more shallow and easy for kids first learning how to eat off a spoon. Very durable- holding up well in the dishwasher and when my daughter bangs them on her tray.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kotarski

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: So far these spoons are great. These are babies first spoons for solids and they are perfect size and shape for a tiny mouth. For such a big moment (eating solids for the first time) as a parent you want it to go smoothly and these spoons helped with that.
customer_reviews.author: Kbull

customer_reviews.title: Makes feeding more clean and sanitary
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons! The lift does what it says it does-keeps the spoon from resting on the table. Keeps it germ free! Also great for resting on the edge of the bowl. Highly recommend! The colors are fun and bright.
customer_reviews.author: 702Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and shape. Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We love these spoons. It’s the perfect depth for our one year old, whose not exactly a pro at using a spoon yet, and they’re very easy to clean. And the ridge feature is nice when you need to set the spoon down for a minute. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AllyCat

customer_reviews.title: Good!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are somewhat soft. Also the back has a little stand to hold the spoon when you set it down. Small enough for a little mouth and they seem durable. Have washed in the dishwasher several times with no issue. The handle is short enough she can learn to feed herself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not soft
customer_reviews.text: Taking away 1 star because I wish the part that goes into the mouth would have been soft. It is not soft there, it’s just all hard plastics. So for younger babies I don’t recommend. It’s more for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spoons for learning to eat (1st Grandbaby) and learning to feed again (new Grandma)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my baby grand daughter and I think they work wonderfully. She is able to get all the food off the spoon and they are easy for this grandma to hold on to and I love that you can sit them on the counter or table and the spoon is lifted up. We've tried some other thicker plastic spoons and bamboo spoons but I like these the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Good baby spoons
customer_reviews.text: Only took off a star because they seem to get scratches on the scoop easily overtime. Kids bite hard and it should be a bit tougher. But otherwise, a solid baby soon we’ve bought several of
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love how narrow these spoons are. They make it easy to feed the baby. They are long though so they are designed for you to feed the baby rather than the baby feed his/herself. My baby often takes the spoon from me to feed herself and she can do it for the most part, but the length makes it awkward. She has a different set of spoons for self-feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: They tip out of the bowl. Annoying.
customer_reviews.text: These are great except for the fact that they’re too long to place in a baby bowl. They are weighted on the handle end so they flip out and get food everywhere. Should be weighted on the spoon end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Woman

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite little spoons for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite little spoons for my daughter! I’m a bit OCD so I enjoy matching the spoon color to the food color; it’s an odd guilty pleasure lol. I’ve had these for months with daily use, and none of mine are stained, which I always make sure to at least wash off the food after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Yes you need 6 spoons!
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t understand why they came with so many. Well, once the first one is thrown on the floor and the second is lost in the bib... the third is packed in the diaper bag, the forth is left at grandmas house...that only leaves you with 2 clean ones, haha. Great set and you’ll use all 6, possibly during the same meal.
customer_reviews.author: Stoked!

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect. Our son just started eating solids and they are perfect. the length is great because even if he grabs the spoon I still have control, the spoon part is perfect to just enough to hold a little mouthful. I couldn't find these at target and bought another brand, I ended up getting rid of them and ordering more of these instead!
customer_reviews.author: scott_actually

customer_reviews.title: Great Spoons
customer_reviews.text: How much can you say about spoons? They work as intended, are a good size for my infant, cute colors, and have a handy support on the bottom for when you have to set it down so that it does not touch the surface. Overall great.
customer_reviews.author: Heidy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Started feeding my son purée and didn’t realize I didn’t have spoons! Had to order quick with prime! These are my favorite! I’ve bought others since and I always come back to these.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Spoons cracked
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in these spoons. We have only had them for a month and they have cracked and split open. Our toddler uses them and she does bite on them a little, but we had other munchkin spoons for over a year and never had this problem! I think the shape of them is what causes them to crack so easily. Pro: I like the fact that when you lay the spoon down it doesn’t touch the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are an improvement on their last design, which I also favored. I love the shape of them, they're perfect for scraping the extra globs of food that didn't quite hit their target off baby's face. They're very soft too and won't hurt baby's mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Great first time feeding spoons.
customer_reviews.text: We use these 3-4x daily to feed our 8 month old. Perfect size and comfort. You will need to was them immediately after feeding foods that may stain the plastic. If you do not, they will start to color to the same color as the foods (much like Tupperware does with pasta sauce).
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soper

customer_reviews.title: Great value & design
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great! They wash and sanitize well and are very light. My little one can grip them easily. The spoon tips are semi-flexible but sturdy. These were a great price. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Deeper
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are deeper than what they appear. I thought they would be more on the flat side based off of the pictures and descriptions. However, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: YoWalk

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute spoons and easily fit into small lunch boxes ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute spoons and easily fit into small lunch boxes but! For a one year old that likes rice and other small chopped foods, this spoon is hard to keep food on. It works fine with purees.
customer_reviews.author: MsCrys

customer_reviews.title: Good for feeding and theething
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to chew on them while I feed her. tThey are long enough where she won't choke on them and soft enough that she really likes it. They will stain with dark baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors and the shape....but they say dishwasher safe and I had two get a little melted even whe. I put them on the top rack of the dishwasher. I had wash them now, which is no big deal, but it would be nice to just throw them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not for mommy feeding spoon
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and color! But it’s not easy to feed my baby who just started solid. It’s hard to push the solid/pasty food into the mouth. Maybe it’s good when the baby can feed themselves one day
customer_reviews.author: SAMC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for independent little babies
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying these spoons. Love them. My 5 month old has no problem holding them while attempting to feed herself. She also likes to chew on them. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea A

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Product Description
customer_reviews.text: The product description is wrong. I only got a pack of 3 spoons when I ordered a pack of 6. I'm just keeping those because I need to start feeding and these are the only infant spoons I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The “lift” function is superfluous, and annoying
customer_reviews.text: The nun that provides the “lift” function is annoying. It continually got caught on the rim of the baby food jar I found it unnecessary. We shaved them off with a knife.
customer_reviews.author: Sewards in the Desert

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby spoon!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons so much more than the little ones with the white hot safety coating on the end of the spoon. My baby eats really well with these spoons and she makes less of a mess with these spoons compared to the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size for beginner eaters
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this. The size is just right to get the right amount of food into my 6-months old. It holds puree well. I have been using this for more than a month and it is still great. So far I have only been using one out of the 6, I think this might last a long long time...
customer_reviews.author: L. Y. Wei

customer_reviews.title: Good size for baby food
customer_reviews.text: Love these little spoons. They are the perfect size for feeding a baby purees or yogurt. I find that I get more food in the baby’s mouth vs other small spoon I tried. Very easy to clean, I end up just washing them right away so I keep rotating a couple of the spoons so I probably didn’t need 6. But the colors are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K

customer_reviews.title: Got too much spare time?
customer_reviews.text: The scoop end of the spoon is so small and shallow that it takes FOREVER to get through a meal. These might be fine for a 4-6 month old, but they’ll quickly outgrow it. Skip the tiny size and save your sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Sanitary baby spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love this spoon set. The part that goes in baby’s mouth doesn’t touch the surface when you put the spoon down because of the lift on the back. They’re dishwasher safe and come in pretty colors!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are nice but heavy to rest in the dish. They topple over and get food everywhere. I would not order them again for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydee

customer_reviews.title: They’re spoons. They work. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.text: I think some of the reviews are so strange! Then again, this is my third baby so if the food makes it into the mouth I’m happy. They are great spoons! I like the the little dip because it makes it easier to get in my baby’s mouth with less maneuvering. Overall happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Baby - CAN Bite Plastic Off
customer_reviews.text: Great for feeding young child. Easy to clean. Usually hand-wash or dishwasher top rack clean. *UPDATE - HAZARD - son getting teeth in & can bite plastic off of these spoons. Please supervise closely.
customer_reviews.author: MissKrissy

customer_reviews.title: Soft on gums
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are nice. The tips are pliable and easy on the gums. My son loves to bite on the spoon and shake it like a dog, so the softer tips are nice! ....although maybe he would stop doing that if the spoon didn't feel good....
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Attention Care Givers
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for my 96 year old mother who suffers from Alzheimer's. These spoons are much more comfortable for her as opposed to regular silverware.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Happy Baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is just starting on purées which means a lot of moving her hands away from her mouth. So it’s nice that I can sit them down without them touching the table.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Breining

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - plastic gets easily chewed and cuts mouths
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the plastic they use for the spoons immediately gets teeth marks on it from my little ones and eventually that gets splintered and ends up cutting their mouths. I do not recommend these at all. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Willa

customer_reviews.title: Love that they don't touch the counter
customer_reviews.text: Love that they don't touch the counter! And love colors. They haven't really gotten stained at all and it's been a couple months. Although I always seem to be losing them. They should combine with the "white hot" style. Tricky to find a place to fit them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: adrianita

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons.
customer_reviews.text: These work great for our little one. Perfect size. Easy to clean. Easy to hold, for him and for us. Also soft enough not to hurt him on those over excited bites.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best spoons for starting solids!
customer_reviews.text: Best spoons we’ve found! Easily fits in baby’s tiny mouth and gotta love that it doesn’t hit your table when placed down. Colors are cute too!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very good industrial design - fits in baby's mouth perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very good industrial design - fits in baby's mouth perfectly, not too deep, and a perfect shape for scraping excess food from lips and cheeks. I love this product! Also enough spoons that I don't have to do dishes every 3 seconds :)
customer_reviews.author: julia k

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and safe with babies
customer_reviews.text: I liked the lightness of the spoon and the bright colors. They are safe and easy to use to feed a baby. There is a slight fading of the colors if used in the dishwasher. I would definitely recommend these spoons.
customer_reviews.author: hpalpant

customer_reviews.title: Really like the spoons!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great and have been using for some months. It makes feeding very comfortable. The customer service is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of orange purées!
customer_reviews.text: Love the spoons overall but noticed that orange purées such as carrots and sweet potatoes stain the colored tips. Wish this wasn’t the case as they always look dirty now that they are discolored.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: These definitely aren’t as soft as a silicone spoon so I wouldn’t use for a new eater, but I love them for our 9 month old!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great for babies. We use them to feed my 7 month old. When we're done eating, he loves to grab the spoon and chew on it. Having a long handle is nice when feeding him and trying to maneuver the spoon into his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Adara L. Beamesderfer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Spoons for my Kitty Cats
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use them to spoon feed my Foster kids and they are also great for feeding adult cats who don't have teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Salt

customer_reviews.title: It wasn’t as nise as I expected
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as nice as I expected. The material felt quite stiff because my baby's teeth didn't grow. It seemed too many pieces for one child but that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: who thought of this design?
customer_reviews.text: The handle is heavier than the spoon itself so it keeps tipping over splashing the food all over! Not very smart.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Polonsky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small mouths
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 9 month old daughter. The size is just right for small mouths and she can hold the spoon easily which makes teaching her to self feed simple.
customer_reviews.author: R. Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for feedings :)
customer_reviews.text: Love these.... easy feeding for baby but also toddler loves them too! Dishwasher cleaned and still has bright color!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Soft enough to chew
customer_reviews.text: My 1yr old loved them. I say loved because he ate them, all of them. I wanted to stop him, I really did. But the death grip he had on the spoons and the evil stare he was beating my soul down with proved too strong, all I could do was cower in fear as he ingested six not so small pieces of pretty plastic. Will purchase again, as I believe this is what my son requires of me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the spoons alot.
customer_reviews.text: I like the stand piece at the bottom of the spoon so the spoon doesnt touch the table. It's a great product
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: These are great for babies starting to eat
customer_reviews.text: My baby uses these and they work great (8 months old) easy for her to pick up and soft spoon edge for her mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Larson

customer_reviews.title: All around great.
customer_reviews.text: Really perfect for feeding a little one because of how wide they get at the tip, just a good shape for a baby spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin`

customer_reviews.title: Makes feeding easy!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old grandson is enjoying these ---- so is his mom. The little "stand" on the back is appreciated ---- so is the length of the spoon handle. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diane E. Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy on mouthes.
customer_reviews.text: The right size for tiny mouthes. The coated spoon bowl is great for protecting lips and gums while feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good basic product
customer_reviews.text: Good basic product for a good price. Nothing fancy but they serve their purpose. And that's what matters to me
customer_reviews.author: rueblig

product_meta.title: Munchkin 6 Piece Lift Infant Spoons
product_meta.description:
Size:6 CountWe know food and messes go hand in hand, but don't fret - we just gave baby spoons a serious upgrade. Munchkin's Lift spoons are cleverly designed with a base to keep the spoon tips elevated off tables and counters, away from potential germs. The super soft, BPA-free plastic is shaped like a spatula for easy scooping and gentle face wiping. And while baby might not fully appreciate squeaky-clean utensils between bites, he'll surely love the cheerful colors brightening up his meal. Steer clear of icky, sticky messes with these smartly made infant spoons.

BRAND STORY
By Munchkin
feature_bullets: Spoon tip doesn't touch table or countertop when set down
Soft plastic is gentle on baby's face and gums
Includes 6 spoons with fun translucent colors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,343 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
